0.8.0.en: First publication of the app in test.

0.8.1.en: Updates to cluster connection and resilience, the app now collects ip adresses of all te nodes in the cluster and uses these adresses as fallback for when the original ip/hostname is not reachable. Added capabilities for fallback connection and active address.

0.8.2.en: Fixed flow and device cards issues when multiple devices are created. Added shutdown node device cards.

0.8.3.en: Changed node offline behavior, app icons and images.

0.9.0.en: Major Update: Added Node-level monitoring (VM/LXC counts), Robust Cluster Failover with auto-discovery of backup hosts, and significant performance/polling optimizations.

1.0.0.en: Production Release: Strict timeout fixes, polling persistence fixes, and UI improvements.
